actions.committee: House Committee on Public Works and Transportation
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Public Works and Transportation.

official_title: A bill to amend section 404 (b) of the Federal Aviation Act of 1958 to provide that no physically handicapped individual shall be denied air transportation solely because of such physical handicap.

summary.text: Amends the Federal Aviation Act of 1958 to prohibit air carriers from denying air transportation to physically handicapped individuals solely because of such handicap.

titles.title: A bill to amend section 404 (b) of the Federal Aviation Act of 1958 to provide that no physically handicapped individual shall be denied air transportation solely because of such physical handicap.
